active.description: Whether to show animation effect, only works when used separately with avatar skeleton
active.description_zh: 是否展示动画效果，仅在单独使用头像骨架时生效

shape.description: Specify the shape of the avatar

:size.description: Set the size of the avatar placeholder
:size.description_zh: 设置头像占位图的大小

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className
